text: thm aetyna -bed hlak alamm- alquran man akhtarnahum min 'umat muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm: faminhum zalim linafsih bifiel bed almeasy, waminhum mqtsd, wahu almuadiy llwajbat almjtnb llmhrmat, waminhum sabiq bialkhayrat bi'iidhn allh, 'aya msare mjthd fi al'aemal alsalht, fardiha wnflha, dhlk al'ieta' llktab wastfa' hadhih al'umat hu alfadl alkbyr
